description: We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our team responsible for building scalable data pipelines for financial analytics. The role includes designing ETL processes, optimizing data warehouses, and collaborating with analysts.
requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in data engineering
- Solid knowledge of SQL and database optimization
- Experience with Python and libraries like Pandas or Polars
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS or GCP)
responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain ETL pipelines
- Design and optimize data warehouses
- Collaborate with data scientists and analysts
- Ensure data quality and reliability
